mapper.sql: c.id AS id, c.user_id AS user_id, c.goods_id AS goods_id, c.goods_num AS goods_num, c.create_date AS create_date, c.update_date AS create_date, g.`name` AS goods_name, g.price AS goods_price, g.stock AS goods_stock, g.`describe` AS goods_describe, g.shop_id AS goods_shop_id, g.create_date AS goods_create_date, g.update_date AS goods_update_date
mapper.select: SELECT c.id id, c.user_id user_id, c.goods_id goods_id, c.goods_num goods_num, g.`name` goods_name, g.price goods_price, g.stock goods_stock, g.`describe` goods_describe, g.shop_id goods_shop_id FROM tbl_cart AS c INNER JOIN tbl_goods AS g ON c.goods_id = g.id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT c.id id, c.user_id user_id, c.goods_id goods_id, c.goods_num goods_num, g.`name` goods_name, g.price goods_price, g.stock goods_stock, g.`describe` goods_describe, g.shop_id goods_shop_id FROM tbl_cart AS c INNER JOIN tbl_goods AS g ON c.goods_id = g.id WHERE c.id in ${ids}
